metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11723 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The libpff_name_to_id_map_entry_read function in libpff_name_to_id_map.c in libyal libpff through 2018-04-28 allows remote attackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted pff file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libpff issue 66 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libpff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
